main event: A luminous white object was observed moving in a straight horizontal line at a high rate of speed in Gordonsville, Virginia, disappearing suddenly.
interesting points: The object was described as spherical and luminous.,Observations reported by multiple witnesses including pilots and CAA operators.,The object was sighted around 15 June 1952 at approximately 1235 to 1300 Eastern.,Visibility was noted as scattered with a weather pattern of cumulus clouds.,There were inquiries about potential balloon launches on the same day as the sighting.
witness description: witnesses included pilots and CAA operators.
